title: Red mullet with spicy peppers, chorizo and black olives with candied aubergine
ingredients: small bunch fresh thyme, leaves only
1 red onion, peeled and finely chopped
1 tsp ras el hanout (Moroccan spice mixture available in Middle Eastern stores)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
few coriander sprigs, leaves only, chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
